description: Contains information about an attribute field.
title: type

___name.description: A user-friendly name for the type.

___templates.description: Defined as a property of the layer definition when there are no types defined; otherwise, templates are defined as properties of the types.

esriDocumentation.additionalInformation: drawingTool strings: esriFeatureEditToolPolygon, esriFeatureEditToolTriangle, esriFeatureEditToolRectangle, esriFeatureEditToolLeftArrow, esriFeatureEditToolRightArrow, esriFeatureEditToolEllipse, esriFeatureEditToolUpArrow, esriFeatureEditToolDownArrow, esriFeatureEditToolCircle, esriFeatureEditToolFreehand, esriFeatureEditToolLine, esriFeatureEditToolText, esriFeatureEditToolPoint

$eref.description: Templates describe features that can be created in a layer. They are generally used with feature collections and editable web-based CSV layers. Templates are not used with ArcGIS feature services as these already have templates defined in the service. They are also defined as properties of the layer definition when there are no defined types. Otherwise, templates are defined as properties of the types.
$eref.title: template

___name.description: A string containing a user-friendly name for the template.

___description.description: A string value containing a detailed description of the template.

___drawingTool.description: An optional string that can define a client-side drawing tool to be used with this feature.

___prototype.description: A feature object representing a prototypical feature for the template.

$eref.description: Domains specify the set of valid values for a field. The links below are the available domains.
$eref.title: domain

___domains.description: A comma-delimited series of domain objects for each domain in the type.

___id.description: A unique string or numerical ID for the type.
